TUBAFsoilFunctions 0.2.2

SEMACHv3 raw data plotter

SEMACHv3_plot_raw.Rd

Display raw measurement data loaded by load_SEMACHv3_raw, or equivalent. Designed primarily for displaying CO2 measurement data, but can also be used for other data. Plots facet for each varaible.

Usage

SEMACHv3_plot_raw(
  dataset,
  variables = "CO2.SCD30",
  cutoff_start = 0,
  cutoff_end = 10800,
  rm_bad_SCD30 = T,
  rm_bad_GMP252 = T,
  leg_pos = "top"
)

Arguments

dataset

Raw SEMACHv3 measurement file or glued set of measurement files (i.e., bind_rows()) loaded by load_SEMACHv3_raw, or equivalent.

variables

Variables that are to be displayed. Can be single character or vector of character. If not available in dataset, warning will be displayed and entry is omitted. Default=c("CO2.SCD30")

cutoff_start

Use data from when after measurement start (Default=0).

cutoff_end

Use data to when after measurement start (Default=10800). If measurement duration is smaller, all available data is used.

rm_bad_SCD30

Should bad SCD30 measurements be omitted from the data (negative or 0 values). If SCD30 is not plotted, this will be disregarded. Default=T

leg_pos

Argument handed to theme(legend.positon=leg_pos). Default="top". Set "none" to draw no legend. Details see ggplot2::theme()

rm_bad_GMP252n

Should bad GMP252 measurements be omitted from the data (negative or 0 values). If GMP252 is not plotted, this will be disregarded. Default=T
